a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTHepatitisB3DosesLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Hepatitis B.3 doses) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: 3-dose schedule (birth dose + 2 primary series doses), on-time start * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTHepatitisB3DosesLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "No hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}"

operand.name: No hepatitis B primary series doses were administered
Client's age is less than {Member States defined lower limit}

a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "One hepatitis B primary series dose was administered"
"The latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

a:s.a:s: "Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered"
"Client's weight at birth was below 2000 g"
"The latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago"

def.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B-containing vaccine was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client's age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B-containing vaccine was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.

when.name: Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 4

then.value: Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.

a:s.a:s: "Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B-containing vaccine administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'

when.name: Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1

then.value: Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.

a:t.name: output

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Complete"

Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 2

def.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Guidance

a:s.a:s: "Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 1"
'Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was over 2000 g and who was not premature infant. Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered.'
"Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 2"

'The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was below 2000 g and who was a premature infant. Four hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'

when.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 1

then.value: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was over 2000 g and who was not premature infant. Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered.

when.name: Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 2

then.value: The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was below 2000 g and who was a premature infant. Four hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"

'Should not vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is not within appropriate age range. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the first dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 1"
'Should vaccinate client with first hepatitis B dose as client\'s age is within appropriate age range. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"

'Should not vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 2"
'Should vaccinate client with second hepatitis B dose as the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 1"
'Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was over 2000 g and who was not premature infant. Two hepatitis B primary series doses were administered.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B-containing vaccine was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due, and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the third dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 3"

'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B-containing vaccine administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Client is not due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 4"

'Should not vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered less than 4 weeks ago. Check for any other vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for the next dose.'
"Client is due for a hepatitis B vaccination Case 4"
'Should vaccinate client with third hepatitis B dose as the client was a low-birth-weight infant and the latest hepatitis B dose was administered more than 4 weeks ago. Check for contraindications.'
"Hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete Case 2"

'The hepatitis B immunization schedule is complete for client whose weight at birth was below 2000 g and who was a premature infant. Four hepatitis B primary series doses were administered. Check for any other vaccines due.'
